title: Mahoutsukai no Konyakusha (LN) - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Adapted to Manga   Aristocracy   Caring Protagonist   Childhood Friends   Demon Lord   Early Romance   Engagement   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Nobles   Past Plays a Big Role   Politics   Reincarnated in Another World   Sword And Magic   Wars
author: Nakamura Shuri   中村朱里
description: I who was reincarnated into a world of sword and magic. The revived Demon King, the Hero chosen by the holy sword─────in the middle of that unfolding common fantasy trope, the position bestowed upon me was to be the magician’s fiancée.>
